document.title: Task Force Mission Statement

author.organization: U.S. Secretary of Labor's Task Force on Excellence in State and Local Government Through Labor-Management Cooperation

document.abstract: The economic success of our Nation, as well as the social well-being of its citizens, depend, in large measure, on the essential services and infrastructure provided by state and local government. The imperative to compete in an increasingly worldwide economy and to respond to increasing societal demands requires that governments at all levels perform in a timely and cost-effective manner. It is essential that public management and organizations of their employees work together in order to respond effectively to these fundamental needs. To this end, the Secretary of Labor has established a Task Force on Excellence in State and Local Government through Labor-Management Cooperation.
